V8.0-20210120    
控制器：10.1.100.40
交换机dpid按照末尾的IP地址配置，如10.1.100.11，则交换机dpid为11，控制器上配置为 pof:000000000000000b


核心 10.1.100.11
interface-add -m A4:23:05:00:11:00 -i 10.13.101.1/30 -i 2400:dd01:1037:9:192:168:9:10/64 pof:00000000000000c9/0 veth92010
interface-add -m A4:23:05:00:11:01 -i 10.13.101.5/30 -i 2400:dd01:1037:9:192:168:9:11/64 pof:00000000000000c9/1 veth92011
interface-add -m A4:23:05:00:11:02 -i 10.13.101.9/30 -i 2400:dd01:1037:9:192:168:9:12/64 pof:00000000000000c9/2 veth92012
interface-add -m A4:23:05:00:11:03 -i 10.13.101.13/30 -i 2400:dd01:1037:9:192:168:9:13/64 pof:00000000000000c9/3 veth92013
interface-add -m A4:23:05:00:11:07 -i 10.13.101.17/30 -i 2400:dd01:1037:9:192:168:9:17/64 pof:00000000000000c9/7 veth92017
